system.effect: A Generally horrifying thing, immune to: Poison, disease, needing to breathe, most environmental hazards, bleeding, stunning, and any critical effect that would destroy it not dealt through a Psychic Power, Force Weapon, or Holy Attack.

description.value: A Generally horrifying thing, immune to: Poison, disease, needing to breathe, most environmental hazards, bleeding, stunning, and any critical effect that would destroy it not dealt through a Psychic Power, Force Weapon, or Holy Attack.
